meanFrameTime_raf.summary: Average time for each frame, calculated using requestAnimationFrame
meanFrameTime_raf.details: May not be very accurate since heavy UI threads see one event for multiple frames drawn on the screen.

framesPerSec_raf.summary: Number of Frames per second (fps) drawn on the screen, calculated using requestAnimationFrame.
framesPerSec_raf.details: 60 fps is a good benchmark for a smooth experience. May not be very accurate since heavy UI threads see one event for multiple frames drawn on the screen.

droppedFrameCount.summary: The number of frames produced by the GPU were over 16.6ms apart

numAnimationFrames.summary: Total number of times requestAnimationFrame was called

numFramesSentToScreen.summary: The number of frames the GPU sent to the screen
